Text.Value: Ponder what you know of the monk's affliction. What are the consequences of accepting it?
*The madness tugs at your mind, prods in places best left untouched. You feel your wisdom begin to drain...*
Relax your mind. Let the madness siphon your wisdom.
Who, now, shall bear the madness Shar has wrought on me, so I might no longer suffer?
Steel yourself and guide the sensations elsewhere.
*You remain wise as ever, even as Shar's madness spreads outward.*
HOO!

EditorData.SFXTags: [HA] SFX of ghost transfer from zombie into player
EditorData.VFXTags: [HA] VFX of ghost transfer from zombie into player

Text.Value: *The urge to laugh dwindles, though you can't help but chuckle. You withstood the monk's madness and earned Tasha's Hideous Laughter.*

EditorData.SFXTags: [AK] SFX of avatar making a small chuckle

Text.Value: *A lopsided grin stretches your face as the madness saps your wisdom.*
Call on the parasite to absorb the strike.
Call on your wits and shield your mind's most vulnerable reaches.
*Try as you might, you can't intuit the price of bearing the monk's madness.*
Enough. I want no part of this!
*You giggle, struck by the absurdity of the moment. A spirit hiding inside an amulet has brought you to the body of his granddaughter and possessed it. Outrageous! Ridiculous!*
Gods, no. I don't want to inherit your curse.
Oh ho, honoured Shirra. Her spirit hath fled - and her body but merely a husk. Heh heh hee-hee-HEE!
Thou shalt know the extent of Shar's mania. Tasha's Hideous Laughter, at thine beck and call.
Well if laugh I must, let our alliance end on a lark!
Swear, I did, to shed this foul mania and bestow it upon Shirra! She was to endure, to suffer, as was her god Ilmater's wont!
*The corpse is an empty husk once more. The monk, liberated from madness, is finally at peace.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The corpse slumps over. The monk has been released.

Text.Value: Muster your senses, clear your mind. You will take the madness, but it will not take of you.
My friend - forgive me, for this mind was not mine own. May laughter be thy gift, never thy curse.

EditorData.NodeContext: Serious for the first time. The monk has been cleansed of madness and can go to the god Lathander.
EditorData.SFXTags: [HA] VFX of the ghost coming out of the player body and stand infront of player
EditorData.VFXTags: [HA] VFX of the ghost coming out of the player body and stand infront of player

Text.Value: Accept the inevitable. Allow your wisdom to drain.
But at what cost, who might say? Ho-ho-HO!
He-ho-hoo-haHAHAHAHAHA! Shall it be - THOU?
HA! HO! Hee-HEE!
Call on the parasite to absorb the strike.
*Your muscles tingle and your mouth twitches as the laughing madness spreads through you.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Mad Monk's ghost leaps from the zombie into the player.
EditorData.SFXTags: [AK] SFX of ghost transfer from zombie into player
EditorData.VFXTags: [AK] VFX of ghost transfer from zombie into player, player glowing from being possessed

Text.Value: Hold firm. You will make this curse a gift. You will not surrender your wisdom.
Farewell...

EditorData.NodeContext: A wistful and trailing goodbye. The monk has been cleansed of madness and can go to the god Lathander.

Text.Value: The Morninglord calls. Canst thou feel the warmth of his blessing? This is not my final twilight... but a new dawn.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Mad Monk's spirit laughs and vanishes into the sky.
EditorData.NodeContext: Dead serious. The monk has been cleansed of madness and can go to the god Lathander.

Text.Value: If it will bring you peace, I will bear the madness.
*Once again, you feel your wisdom draining away. Hilarious! Or is it?*
Rally the tadpole, let it take the brunt of the damage.
*You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*
*Ha! You've earned Tasha's Hideous Laughter, and you're all the more foolish for it. Congratulations!*
*The monk himself holds your answer. Tasha's Hideous Laughter is a powerful skill - but earning it may come at the cost of wisdom.*
And what happens if I say yes?

Synopsis: A player opens up Shirra Clarwen's crypt with the Sentient Amulet in tow. This will make the Mad Monk inside the amulet possess Shirra's body.
